articleContent.title: Chord: 11th in C# (Shape: G)
articleContent.content:
# Chord: 11th in C# (Shape: G)

## Description
The 11th chord in the key of C# with a G shape is a versatile and lush chord that can add depth and color to your music. It is a rich and jazzy-sounding chord, often used to create a dreamy and atmospheric quality in music.

## Notes and Intervals
- Root (C#)
- Major Third (E#)
- Perfect Fifth (G#)
- Major Seventh (B#)
- Major Ninth (D#)
- Perfect Eleventh (F#)

## Genre and Musical Flavor
This chord is often used in jazz, R&B, and soul music to add a sophisticated and harmonically rich element to the composition. It can evoke feelings of longing, nostalgia, and introspection, making it a popular choice for ballads and slow-tempo songs.

## Songs
Here are three songs that feature the 11th chord in C# with a G shape:
1. "Georgia on My Mind" by Ray Charles
2. "Give Me One Reason" by Tracy Chapman
3. "At Last" by Etta James
